attributes.action: Ban Police using Horses to control Protests and Riots.
attributes.additional_details: The recent London protests have lead to forms of violence against the police on horseback which have in turn injured horses. This is not acceptable.
attributes.background: We would like the government to take into consideration that police horses being used as intimidation during protesting and rioting have seen horses being injured. We would like the welfare of horses to be put first and not allowed to be put in a situation of danger.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Ban the use of horses in the police force: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/325179

Ban the use of horses for crowd control: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/325275
